name: Arduinocore-samd-atsamd21e18a
tagline: Arduino compatability for the Atmel SAM D21 E (ATSAMD21E18A)
body:
### How to use
Add the following URL to your Arduino IDE via `File > Preferences`, under the `Settings` tab, in the `Additional Boards Manager URLs` field.

```
(Insert URL)
```

...Then, open up the Arduino Board Manager via `Tools > Board > Board Manager`. Install the `FemtoIO SAM D21 E core` package.
note: Don't delete this file! It's used internally to help with page regeneration.
